description: The nicest hike on our vacation.Very nice view of glacier and waterfalls. A part of the hike runs above the tree border. On half of the distance is a hut of the Alpine Club. The descent at the end of the hike is precipitous and strenuous.Elevation gain 700m.
directions: From Highway 1 (Trans Canada Highway) turn north to Takakkaw Falls in Yoho National Park. (You need an National Parks pass). There is a parking area at the end of the road.Parking for the Iceline trail is in the Takakkaw Falls parking area.
title: Iceline Trail via Little Yoho
